spider-t-shirt,,Default,configurable,Default Category/Arts & Culture,base,Odilon Redon (Spider),"

This t-shirt design is one of two which admire the French artist, Odilon Redon (1840
column3: 1916). His work is very interesting and is said to be representations of his ""inner thoughts"" - his works are difficult to interpret, he once said ""My drawings inspire, and are not to be defined. They place us, as does music, in the ambiguous realm of the undetermined."" I have used part of this quote in my Odilon Redon (Egg) t-shirt design along with a rough sketch of one of his works.

column1: This Odilon Redon (Spider) t-shirt is in admiration of his painting The Smiling Spider which can be found in the
column3:
e du Louvre.
